ygData.subject: RE: the dead
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Just want to mention to those that may want to try this ... this is a very very hard camp. They are all or very nearly all casters (clerics and druids etc)
ygData.messageBody:
> I found another way to increase faction with "the dead" for those
> that care.
>
> Enroute to Unrest in Cauldron, there's a camp of goodie tooshoes. Polish
> them off and you're on your way to making "the dead" very happy.
> On a side
> note, other people are going to hate you.

Just want to mention to those that may want to try this ... this is a very
very hard camp. They are all or very nearly all casters (clerics and druids
etc) and this is a hard place to run because of all the hills (trust me,
I've fallen to my death here running from these schmose). I'm 26 now and
they almost killed me yesterday when I was walking and not paying attention
and passed the exit (easy to do in the Cauldron). I would be wary of these
people still with a full group but it is probably possible ...

Do you have a better estimate of when it is safe to wipe these folks out,
Princess? They are blue at 26, I think they were white and yellow around 19
but I can't remember for sure (it's been a long time since I was 19).
